Author: jl777c#5810
Content: ask if you have any questions about the design

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this is a standard way to speed things up. whenever there is a need for a sleep, put it in a queue

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then process that queue in parallel. if that processing also needs a sleep, you make another queue, etc

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Ok sounds good,

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: remember to not have any sleeps :trollface:

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: what is the process for creating a 50% premine into the dice contract?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
`./komodod -ac_name=KMDICE -ac_supply=10500000 -ac_reward=2500000000 -ac_halving=210000 -ac_cc=2 -addressindex=1 -spentindex=1 -addnode=144.76.217.232 &`
the `-ac_supply=10500000` is the premined fund. you need to create fund the dice contract using that fund

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: thanks @SHossain but no need to put -ac_pubkey to have it go into the dice plan?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: yes
